cartoon | name | description
⏰🐋🌈 | get_average_lightcurve | Get the weighted average light curve.
⏰🔎🌈 | get_for_time | Get a quantity associated with a time index.
⏰🖖🌈 | get_median_lightcurve | Get the median light curve.
⏰👌🌈 | get_ok_data_for_time | Get a quantity associated with a time index.
⏰🛰🌈 | get_times_as_astropy | Get the times as an astropy Time object.
⏰🚀🌈 | set_times_from_astropy | Set the times from an astropy Time object (modifies in-place).
